section.name: SEDA Approach
section.p: At the present moment, the performance benefits of SEDA are at the top of the list. Other features which make SEDA based servers more instrumentable, resilient and extensible are not sought after at the present moment. Under heavy load we would like the server to perform well without rapid degradation while servicing requests.

Furthermore we want to add these features without incurring more complexity in the server's design. Keeping things as simple as possible is a driving factor in our approach simple SEDA implementation. Hence to simple SEDA stage is simply a combination of a event queue, thread pool, stage handler, and a driver thread. The one extra feature we do support is the EnquePredicates which might be used to manage load shedding.
The simple SEDA code can be found the common frontend API within the org.apache.eve.seda package.
